body:
What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. Have a Blade Splicer in play
2. Cast a Restoration Angel
3. Target the Blade Splicer's golem token with the Angel's comes-into-play ability What is the expected output? What do you see instead? The golem should vanish as soon as it's exiled. Instead, it returns to play, as if it was a card. What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? 1.30, OS X
author: [manve.he...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/107839499302741838633/)
